overview: Pre-Skillshare, Danya Cheskis-Gold recruited hundreds of college students from across the country to join Teach For America, a national movement to end educational inequity. She designed the trainings for TFA’s countrywide campus intern program and led the connectivity efforts for the recruitment team staff. In her free time, she serves on American Jewish World Service’s young leadership Steering Committee and hosts potlucks, sends out music blasts, and gives advice on getting what you want (whether mid-century furniture or a career change). Danya graduated from Washington University in St. Louis with a degree in Anthropology, Spanish, and Music.
